de.dfki.oms.adom

Class ADOMContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Application
        • de.dfki.oms.adom.ADOMContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class ADOMContainer
extends org.restlet.Application
    Organizes and provides access to the ADOMeRestlets representing the OMS's object memories.
    Author:
    Christian Hauck

    • Method Detail

      • AddAdditionalServerName

        public static void AddAdditionalServerName(java.lang.String serverName)
        Adds an additional server name to the server names list.

      • initializeADOMs

        public static void initializeADOMs(OMMVersionManagerHistory history)
        Sets up the ADOMeRestlets representing all known object memories (should be called at server startup).
        Parameters:
        history - A OMMVersionManagerHistory object determining whether the memories should maintain a history.

      • getAdom

        public static ADOMeRestlet getAdom(java.lang.String mem_name)
        Retrieves the ADOMe Restlet representing a given object memory.
        Parameters:
        mem_name - The requested memory's name.
        Returns:
        The memory as an ADOMeRestlet.

      • registerNewMemory

        public static boolean registerNewMemory(java.lang.String mem_name,
                                        OMMVersionManagerHistory history,
                                        de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock ownerBlock)
        Adds a new object memory to the known memories and creates a REST interface subtree for it.
        Parameters:
        mem_name - Name of the new memory.
        history - A OMMVersionManagerHistory object determining whether a history for the memory should be maintained.
        ownerBlock - Owner information about the new memory as an OMMBlock.
        Returns:
        True, if the memory has been added successfully.

        public org.restlet.Restlet createInboundRoot()
        Overrides:
        createInboundRoot in class org.restlet.Application
